data.title: Text. Drive. Die.
data.meta_description: Educating people about the dangers of texting and driving.  Tips, links, pledge, thumb bands and more.
data.text:
Will Your Next Text Be Your Last?

Read the last text message you received out loud.

Would reading or responding to that text message from behind the wheel of a moving vehicle be worth the risk of dying or killing someone else for?

16th May 2009: Ashley died while reading her sister's text. Ashley is dead and her sister will never forget that it was her text message that killed her sister. Four little letters, "YEAH" that's what killed her!
